backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing logo integration and header layout updates tied to CalculatorPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing brief summaries for major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme tokens using OKLCH variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags and root mounting container.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web manifest enabling PWA installation with icons and standalone display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the CalculatorPage inside a full-height layout.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Calcula: Display component showing the current expression, result, or error with styled layout.
Scientific keypad component rendering an 8x4 grid of buttons with variant styling and click handling.
Main calculator page combining header, display, keypad, history toggle, steps panel, and footer.
frontend/src/features/calculator/useCalc: Hook managing calculator state, input handling, parsing, evaluation, and step generation.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: Scrollable panel showing stored calculation history with clear functionality.
frontend/src/features/history/useLocalHi: Hook managing persistent history through localStorage with load, add, and clear logic.
frontend/src/features/steps/StepsPanel.t: Accordion panel displaying numbered step-by-step solution explanations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub hook that returns an empty object because the app requires no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light/dark theme variables and utility classes for layout and safe-area support.
frontend/src/lib/calc/evaluate.ts: Evaluates an AST of mathematical expressions, supporting constants, operators, unary ops, and functions with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/calc/math.ts: Implements factorial with input validation and safeguards against invalid or excessively large values.
frontend/src/lib/calc/parse.ts: Parses tokens into an AST using precedence rules for operators, functions, parentheses, and unary/postfix operators.
frontend/src/lib/calc/stepSolver.ts: Generates human-readable evaluation steps from an expression, including token summary, AST description, and step-by-step evaluation.
frontend/src/lib/calc/tokenize.ts: Tokenizes a math expression, normalizing symbols and producing tokens for numbers, operators, functions, constants, and parentheses.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins.
